text: sot iike this is a short summary of how
to make mango and sticky rice for the
full version please click on the link in
the description let's get started
wash the sticky rice in cold water 5
times or until the water runs clear
soak the rice in cold water for at least
4 hours or overnight drain the rice well
and then steamed for 25 to 30 minutes
while the rice is cooking make the
coconut syrup combined some coconut milk
sugar salt and cook just until the sugar
is completely dissolved when the rice is
done immediately pour the syrup over the
rice
stir it up and let it sit for 20 minutes
stir the rice one last time and then let
it sit for at least another 20 minutes
or until you're ready to serve let's now
make the salted coconut sauce to go over
the rice
dissolve a bit of rice flour in water
and add it to some coconut milk add some
salt and cook them till the sauce comes
to a boil and has thickened finally the
crispy mung beans rinse the beans a
couple of times uncover with cold water
bring them to a gentle boil then
immediately remove from heat cover and
let's sit for 10 minutes rinse and drain
off the beans
toast them in a lightly greased saute
pan unto their golden brown and crunchy
now everything is done let's put it all
together
serve your rice beside some fresh sweet
mango top it with some coconut sauce and
don't forget the mung beans if you don't
have a good fresh mango don't worry you
can also make a beautiful mango compote
with frozen mango and that's it for all
the details please click here for the
full version of this recipe and I will
see you soon
cop Khun kha
